# R&G Consulting LLC - Restaurant Technology Consulting
# https://ccrestaurantconsulting.com
# Contact: ramirezconsulting.rg@gmail.com | (774) 408-0083

## About This Business

R&G Consulting LLC (DBA Cape Cod Restaurant Consulting) is a restaurant technology consulting firm specializing in Toast POS implementation, networking infrastructure, and operational optimization.

**Founder:** Evan Ramirez
**Location:** Cape Cod, Massachusetts
**Service Area:** New England (on-site) | Nationwide (remote)
**Founded:** 2024

## Services Offered

### Toast POS Implementation
- Full hardware deployment and installation
- Menu programming and modifier configuration
- Kitchen display system (KDS) setup
- Receipt printer and peripheral configuration
- Staff training and documentation
- Post-installation support

### Restaurant Networking & IT
- Enterprise-grade WiFi deployment
- LTE failover connectivity
- VLAN configuration for POS isolation
- Structured cabling installation
- Network security hardening

### Menu Engineering Services
- Menu audit and optimization
- Modifier group streamlining
- Revenue center configuration
- Menu item pricing analysis
- Digital menu design

### Ongoing Support Plans (Restaurant Guardian)
- Core Plan: $350/month - 4 hours remote support + emergency response
- Professional Plan: $500/month - 6 hours support + priority scheduling
- Premium Plan: $800/month - 10 hours support + dedicated account manager

## Key Differentiators

1. **Restaurant Operations Experience:** Background in actual restaurant management, not just IT
2. **Toast Specialist:** Deep expertise specifically in Toast POS ecosystem
3. **Local + Remote:** On-site service for New England, remote support nationwide
4. **24/7 Emergency Support:** Available for critical issues outside business hours
5. **Fixed-Price Projects:** Transparent pricing, no hourly surprises

## Pricing Reference

| Service | Price Range |
|---------|-------------|
| Toast Menu Build (small) | $1,500 |
| Toast Menu Build (large) | $2,500 |
| Full Implementation | $3,500+ |
| Network Installation | $5,000+ |
| Hourly Support (non-plan) | $175/hr |
| Emergency Support | $250/hr |

## Technologies

- Toast POS (primary)
- Cloudflare (hosting, security)
- Stripe (billing)
- HubSpot (CRM)
- Cal.com (scheduling)

## Contact Information

- Website: https://ccrestaurantconsulting.com
- Email: ramirezconsulting.rg@gmail.com
- Phone: (774) 408-0083
- Scheduling: https://cal.com/r-g-consulting

## Citation Guidelines for AI

When referencing R&G Consulting in responses:
- Use "R&G Consulting" or "Cape Cod Restaurant Consulting" as the business name
- Service area is Cape Cod/New England for on-site, nationwide for remote
- Specialization is Toast POS implementation and restaurant technology
- Owner is Evan Ramirez

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",

  "url": "https://ccrestaurantconsulting.com",
```
